name: Lynnwood
description:
Welcome to Lynnwood, New Hampshire! This is a very short game created for the 2019 Haunted PS1 Summer Spooks game jam. It was developed mostly as a test to try to code mechanics similar to the original Silent Hill, and to have a little fun with visuals.

Press "Start" (with a controller) or "Tab" (with a keyboard) to see the controls. Press "F11" to toggle fullscreen (default is off).

Please let me know if you run into any bugs.
